content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Encourage your subordinates to become “EPAM HEROES”. “EPAM HEROES”\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is an appreciation service that lets you publicly applaud the great achievements of your colleagues with special badges. It's a good chance to recognize those who are the best examples of EPAM culture and do their job awesomely. Moreover, all the digital badges in the catalog are tied to corporate values. The badges will be displayed in employee \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://upsa.epam.com/workload/employeeView.do#emplTab=general\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"UPSA profiles\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Visit \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://heroes.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Heroes Portal\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" to honor your colleagues in real-time! \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://kb.epam.com/download/attachments/236658648/hero.png?version=1&modificationDate=1433760870000&api=v2\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
